text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! And, once again, welcome 
to Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Inspiring! I'm looking forward to seeing 
more of your illustrious efforts 
with the Umamusume in your care!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
So! To guide you through the process, 
I'll be assigning you some tasks. 
In other words, I have a number 
of missions for you to complete!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Furthermore, upon completing these 
missions, you shall receive... rewards! 
You'll receive gifts from me as well!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I paid for all of this out of pocket, 
so I kindly ask that you keep this a 
secret from Tazuna!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Press on! Strive with all your might! 
For yourself and, above all, 
for the racers in your charge!
